overview: Documental experimental  |  2k  |  Blanco y negro  |  15:41|  Internet |  2021 An elephant sways while Christ sleeps, at the same time, the sea of vigilance rests on algorithms that can see themselves, and, at the same time, the cinema can see without being seen.  A short film made with life streaming images from security cameras open around the world.
tagline: A short film made with life streaming images from security cameras open around the world.
title: Copyleft
